actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of specified dollar amounts for each of the National Science Foundation's major program areas (and certain subprograms), and to provide requirements relating to periods of availability and transfers of the authorized funds.

summary.text: National Science Foundation Authorization Act - Authorizes appropriations for each of the National Science Foundation's major program areas during fiscal year 1979.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of specified dollar amounts for each of the National Science Foundation's major program areas (and certain subprograms), and to provide requirements relating to periods of availability and transfers of the authorized funds.
